backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores per-user best scores, accepts score submissions, and returns a sorted list of top scores.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend game and UI files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a custom OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the GameShell and a footer linking to caffeine.ai.
Canvas component running the game loop, handling input, rendering, and restart logic.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: Game over overlay showing score, wave count, score submission, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/components/game/GameShell.t: Top-level controller managing game phases and composing canvas and UI layers.
frontend/src/components/game/Hud.tsx: HUD displaying score, wave, and player health hearts.
frontend/src/components/game/PauseOverla: Pause screen overlay with resume and restart options.
frontend/src/components/game/StartScreen: Displays the game's start screen with controls overview and a button that triggers onStart.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Fetches and displays the top 10 scores with loading, error, and empty states in a table.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Subm: Handles user login and score submission, showing appropriate UI for signing in, submitting, or success.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Loads and caches image assets for the game, providing async loading and access to cached results.
frontend/src/game/input.ts: Manages keyboard and mouse input, updating state and handling pause/restart shortcuts.
frontend/src/game/logic.ts: Runs core game updates including player movement, enemy spawning, shooting, collisions, and game state progression.
frontend/src/game/renderer.ts: Renders the game state onto a canvas, drawing background, player, enemies, and bullets using loaded assets.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines game entity types, constants, difficulty settings, and math helpers for movement and distance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup with customizable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch top scores and submit new scores through an actor interface. Handles cache invalidation after score submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for theming in both light and dark modes. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings. Loads plugins and binds styles to CSS variable–driven theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, required assets, and existing feature implementations for a browser-based shooting game with leaderboard support.
